Instructions

  1. Ask your landlord for his/her Ethereum address. Your landlord will need to have access to this account in 4 weeks in order to retrieve the security deposit.
  2. Enter your landlord's Ethereum address in the field provided, along with the deposit amount. The deposit amount will be denominated in ETH, so if you need to look at the latest conversion price, check here.
  3. Take back your security deposit within 4 weeks for any reason. Let your landlord know before you do so. This way, the landlord will have the opportunity to address your concern.
  4. After 4 weeks, you will lose access to this deposit, and your landlord will have the ability to withdraw the deposit to his/her Ethereum address.
